  • Constructor Details

    • Bear

      public Bear()
      Creates a bear of random age (within a bear's normal lifespan) and random gender.

    • Bear

      public Bear(int age, Animal.Gender gender)
      Creates a bear of specified age and gender. If the specified age is larger than the maximum age of a bear, the age is set to that maximum.
      Parameters:
      age - The age of the animal
      gender - The gender of the animal

  • Method Details

    • maxAge

      public boolean maxAge()
      Description copied from class: Animal
      Determines whether this animal is at its maximum age.
      Specified by:
      maxAge in class Animal
      Returns:
      True if the animal is at its max age, false otherwise.

    • incrAge

      public boolean incrAge()
      Description copied from class: Animal
      Increments the animal age by one, if possible.
      Specified by:
      incrAge in class Animal
      Returns:
      True if the operation is successful, false if the operation failed and the age remains as it was.

    • getStrength

      public int getStrength()
      Get this bear's strength, a function of its age.
      Returns:
      The strength of the bear, an integer value from 0 to 5.
